original_text: Tell us why you have forgotten us. Tell us why you have left us alone for so long. Tell us why you have forgotten us.
korean_text: 주께서 어찌하여 우리를 영원히 잊으시오며 우리를 이같이 오래 버리시나이까

sentences.original_text: Tell us why you have forgotten us
Tell us why you have left us alone
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 우리를 홀로 남겨두셨는지 말씀해 주세요

sentences.original_text: Tell us why you have forgotten us
